Rewritten and rephrased text:

**RFSO Leather Tender Notice**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a supplier to provide high-quality leather goods for the manufacturing of soft seating furniture for Correctional Service of Canada (CSC). This Request for Standing Offer (RFISO) invites bidders to submit a proposal for the supply of leather according to the technical requirements outlined in Annex A.

The standing offer will be valid for a period of one (1) year, with the possibility to extend for four (4) additional one-year periods. Orders will be issued on an "as & when requested" basis. Suppliers from any region may participate in this tendering process.

**Key Details**

* **Solicitation Number**: WS453082327
